original_text: While Jesus was saying these things to the people, a leader at the Jewish meeting place came to him. The man went down on his knees in front of Jesus and said to him, ‘My daughter has just died. Come to my house. Put your hand on her and then she will live again.’
korean_text: 예수께서 이 말씀을 하실 때에 한 관리가 와서 절하며 이르되 내 딸이 방금 죽었사오나 오셔서 그 몸에 손을 얹어 주소서 그러면 살아나겠나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: While Jesus was saying these things to the people
a leader at the Jewish meeting place came to him
sentences.korean_translation: 유대 회당의 한 지도자가 그에게 왔다

sentences.original_text: The man went down on his knees in front of Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 예수 앞에 무릎을 꿇었다

sentences.original_text: and then she will live again
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그녀가 다시 살게 될 것입니다
